content:
Linus Torvalds had wanted to call [Linux] “Freax”, a portmanteau of “free”, “freak”, and “x” (as an allusion to Unix).

can’t believe Linux was supposed to be 𝓯𝓻𝓮𝓪𝓴𝔂 👅
